snippet: The three-bedroom home in Park Slope went for its asking price ($4,975 a month) to the first people who visited.
abstract: Park Slope brownstone owned by New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio is rented out for its asking price to first people who visit.

byline.contributor: Matt A. V. Chaban contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The three-bedroom home in Park Slope went for its asking price ($4,975 a month) to the first people who visited.

headline.main: De Blasio Rents Out Townhouse in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Rents Out Townhouse in Brooklyn
